page.title: 03HOLIDAY ACTIVITIES, BRODICK
page.content:
When children and adults come to Arran for a holiday there are many activities they can pursue in and around the village at Brodick.
{ARCHAEOLOGY {CAMPING:}Glen Rosa Farm {CYCLING:}Cycles can be hired opposite the Village Hall and an adult cycle will cost Â£1.25 for 2 hours or Â£2.50 for the day. Hire for a fortnight would be Â£15. {EATING OUT:}Many people enjoy self-catering holidays but wish the occasional meal at a hotel or restaurant in Brodick. There are 17 establishments in Brodick to satisfy a healthy appetite (8 restaurants and cafes plus 7 hotels open to non-residents).
